#summary How Android-Binding inject the behavior on top of the SDK

= Introduction =

Android-Binding works along with the standard Android SDK. 

= Glossary =

 * View: Most often refers to widget classes (such as TextView, ImageView) in Android, but any subclass from _android.view.View_ is also considered as View. It is also the same as the View in MVVM



 * View Attribute: The bindable attribute of each View Widget
